body:
Follow these steps before you continue.

1. **Check if you need to go to court** Read the [child arrangements guide]({app:urls:url:cait}) to see if there’s a more suitable option
2. **Book a Mediation Information and Assessment Meeting (MIAM)** You’re legally required to attend one unless  [you’re exempt]({app:urls:url:miams-exemptions}). 
3. **Get a signed certificate from your mediator** If you’re not exempt you’ll need this to confirm your MIAM attendance.
4. **Find out if you can get help paying the court fee** You may be able to [get your fee paid]({app:urls:url:help-with-fees}) if you’re on a low income or certain benefits.

!abbr:MIAM!
heading: Before you start your application
